comments.body: Would be nice to be consistent about --data-dir value and --data-dir=value (In Backup() above) Ditto all other flags.
Yes, this is an artifact from how the flags were defined inconsistently in the bash script which I didn't clean up in the translation. I'll do that now.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +151,155 @@	return e.runEtcdctlCommand(version,
		"snapshot", "restore", snapshotFile,
		"--data-dir", e.cfg.dataDirectory,
		"--name", e.cfg.name,
		"--initial-advertise-peer-urls", e.cfg.peerAdvertiseUrls,
